roleset.name: deprive by force
roleset.note: DESPOIL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'despoil' based on sentences in ULA Brown. VerbNetentry 10.6, comparison with 'deprive.' (from despoil.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: Barbarians
example.text: [The savage barbarian hordes]-1 of red Russian Communism descended on the Athens that was mighty Metronome, *PRO*-2 sacking and despoiling withtheir Bolshevistic battle cry of "*PRO* Soak the rich!"
example.arg: with their Bolshevistic battle cry of"Soak the rich!"
